title: Lincoln's WARNING #100022: Market Crash Fears Rise
script: Dodgers won Game 7. Cool. Know what else? 47 bills passed while you watched bases. Sports, drama, ANYTHING to keep eyes off robbery. That game cost you $3,847 in inflation. Bread and circuses. Bitcoin doesn't play games. Scan QR. Listen up. Market Crash Fears Rise... another distraction from the real theft. While you panic, they're laughing to the bank. Wake up. Bitcoin below.
